long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Santa Runner is a delightful holiday-themed endless runner game that brings the spirit of Christmas to life in a fun and exciting way. Players take on the role of Santa Claus himself, dashing through a winter wonderland filled with festive obstacles and challenges.

The objective of Santa Runner is simple: help Santa collect as many presents as possible while avoiding obstacles and hazards along the way. As players guide Santa through the snowy landscape, they'll encounter a variety of obstacles, including ice patches, snowdrifts, and mischievous elves.

The game mechanics are easy to grasp but offer plenty of depth and replayability. Players control Santa's movements by swiping left or right to dodge obstacles or tapping to jump over hazards. Timing and reflexes are key as players navigate through the increasingly treacherous terrain.
